parameters.query:
SELECT 
    g.id as guest_db_id,
    g.guest_id, 
    g.name_ar, 
    g.phone_number,
    g.status,
    g.event_id,
    e.background_image_url,
    e.Maps_link as google_maps_link,
    e.event_date_ar,
    e.venue_ar,
    e.event_name,
    e.bride_name_ar,
    e.groom_name_ar
FROM guests g
JOIN events e ON g.event_id = e.id
WHERE g.status = 'pending'
ORDER BY g.name_ar ASC

SELECT 
    g.id as guest_db_id,
    g.guest_id, 
    g.name_ar, 
    g.phone_number,
    g.status,
    g.event_id,
    e.background_image_url,
    e.Maps_link as google_maps_link,
    e.event_date_ar,
    e.venue_ar,
    e.event_name,
    e.bride_name_ar,
    e.groom_name_ar
FROM guests g
JOIN events e ON g.event_id = e.id
WHERE g.event_id = {{ $json.eventId }} 
  AND g.status = 'pending'
ORDER BY g.name_ar ASC

-- Ø¥ØµÙ„Ø§Ø­ SQL Query ÙÙŠ Ø¹Ù‚Ø¯Ø© "4c. Get Selected Guests"

-- Query Ø§Ù„ØµØ­ÙŠØ­:
SELECT 
    g.id as guest_db_id,
    g.guest_id, 
    g.name_ar, 
    g.phone_number,
    g.status,
    g.event_id,
    e.background_image_url,
    e.Maps_link as google_maps_link,
    e.event_date_ar,
    e.venue_ar,
    e.event_name,
    e.bride_name_ar,
    e.groom_name_ar
FROM guests g
JOIN events e ON g.event_id = e.id
WHERE g.id IN ({{ $json.guestIds.join(',') }}) 
  AND g.event_id = {{ $json.eventId }}
ORDER BY g.name_ar ASC

-- ØªØ£ÙƒØ¯ Ù…Ù† Ø£Ù†:
-- 1. $json.guestIds Ù…ÙˆØ¬ÙˆØ¯ ÙˆÙ‡Ùˆ array
-- 2. $json.eventId Ù…ÙˆØ¬ÙˆØ¯ ÙˆÙ‡Ùˆ number

UPDATE guests SET 
  last_invite_sent = NOW(),
  invite_count = COALESCE(invite_count, 0) + 1,
  last_invite_status = CASE 
    WHEN {{ $json.wasSent || false }} = true THEN 'sent'
    ELSE 'failed'
  END
WHERE id = {{ $json.guestDbId || 0 }}
  AND {{ $json.guestDbId || 0 }} > 0
